Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe in its value and am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. For this incredible opportunity, I propose a special introductory price of $150. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, so don't miss out on the chance to experience the difference it can make in your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
